hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The first place, best overall hack winners will each receive a swag bag and a $50 Amazon gift card, sponsored by WiCS and the Center for Diversity in Engineering.
Winners will receive an Echo Dot each, sponsored by Capital One.
Winners will receive a $15 Amazon gift card each, sponsored by Appian.
Winners will receive a Raspberry Pi Zero each, sponsored by Microsoft.
Winners of this category will receive a $15 Amazon gift card each, sponsored by WiCS.
Winners will have donation of $50 to the charity of their choice, sponsored by Totem.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=85 Engineer's Way, Charlottesville, VA 22903, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Winners of this category will receive Amazon Echo Dots. This category's prize is sponsored by Capital One.
Winners of this category will each receive a $15 Amazon gift card. This category's prize is sponsored by WiCS.
Winners of this category will each receive a $50 Amazon gift card and a swag bag from the Center for Diversity in Engineering. This category's prize is sponsored by WiCS and the CDE.
Winners of this category will receive $50 to donate to the charity of their choice, in their name(s). This category's prize is sponsored by Totem.
Winners of this category will receive Raspberry Pi's. This category's prize is sponsored by Microsoft.
Winners of this category will receive Raspberry Pi's. This category's prize is sponsored by Microsoft.
Winners of this category will each receive $50 gift cards. This category's prize is sponsored by Appian.

hackathon-description-header: Create apps themed around sexual assault prevention.
hackathon-location-description: University of Virginia - Rice Hall (Davis Commons)
